settings.text: Create awesome content in one shot!

settings.title: Jot It Down!
settings.subtitle: Step 1:
settings.text: Using dry-erase markers, jot down prompts to keep you focused on the most important details of your content.

settings.title: Pop It Up!
settings.subtitle: Step 2:
settings.text: Simply slide your Prompter Board over any lens using one of our SafeGrip® attachments. You are now ready to film!

settings.title: Crush It!
settings.subtitle: Step 3:
settings.text: Shoot noticeably cleaner videos with less re-takes! Our Prompter Board is the perfect tool for anyone creating content!
This product has dramatically helped me stay focused, save substantial time and appear more confident behind the camera. This has been a life saver! - Jeremy Blossom
